Header.jobListEmpty: Your job list is empty. Add providers!
Header.voiceAssistDialogDescription: Click the microphone below to start speaking or ask for help.
Header.voiceAssistPrompt: Click the microphone below to start speaking.
Header.voiceAssistNotSupported: Voice recognition not supported in your browser.
Header.voiceAssistErrorGeneric: An error occurred during speech recognition.
Header.voiceAssistErrorNoSpeech: No speech was detected. Please try again.
Header.voiceAssistErrorAudioCapture: Microphone problem. Please ensure it's enabled and working.
Header.voiceAssistErrorNotAllowed: Permission to use microphone was denied. Please enable it in your browser settings.
Header.voiceAssistErrorNetwork: Network error during speech recognition. Check your connection.
Header.voiceAssistErrorStart: Could not start voice recognition. Ensure microphone is connected and permissions allowed.

LandingPage.motivationText: We believe finding reliable local services shouldn't be a chore. kariGaar was born from the desire to simplify this process, empowering both customers to find quality help and skilled professionals to grow their businesses and serve their communities.
LandingPage.efficiencyText: Quickly post jobs, get estimates, and connect with pros without endless searching.
LandingPage.communityText: Fostering connections between local customers and skilled karigaars (artisans).
LandingPage.trustText: Building a platform where quality service and reliability are paramount.
LandingPage.readyToSimplify: Ready to Simplify Your Service Needs?
LandingPage.joinCommunityText: Join the kariGaar community today. Post a job or find a skilled professional in minutes.

PlatformHome.platformDescription: Your one-stop platform to find reliable local service providers for all your needs. From home repairs to garden makeovers, get it done right.
PlatformHome.postJobDescription: Describe your task, set your location, and let skilled professionals come to you.
PlatformHome.findProsDescription: Browse a directory of vetted service providers for any job, big or small.
PlatformHome.qualityDescription: Connect with reliable experts committed to delivering top-notch service.
PlatformHome.readyToTackle: Ready to tackle your to-do list or find your next gig? kariGaar makes it simple.

AboutPage.aboutIntro: Welcome to kariGaar, your trusted platform for connecting with skilled local service professionals. We aim to make finding reliable help for your home and business needs simple, transparent, and efficient.
AboutPage.missionText: Our mission is to empower communities by connecting individuals and businesses with skilled local artisans (karigaars) and service providers. We strive to create a seamless experience that fosters trust, quality, and convenience for everyone involved.
AboutPage.forCustomersText: Find vetted professionals for any task, from plumbing and electrical work to painting and gardening. Get fair estimates, read reviews, and book with confidence.
AboutPage.forProfessionalsText: Grow your business by showcasing your skills to a wider audience. Receive job leads, manage your profile, and build your reputation on a trusted platform.
AboutPage.platformGuideDescription: Our comprehensive platform guide provides step-by-step instructions and tips for using all of kariGaar's features, whether you're looking to hire or offer services.

PlatformGuidePage.platformGuideIntro: Welcome to your comprehensive guide for using kariGaar! Whether you're a customer looking for services or a professional offering them, these guides will help you navigate our platform effectively.
PlatformGuidePage.contactSupportDescription: If you can't find what you're looking for in our guides, please feel free to reach out to our support team (contact details coming soon).

PostJobPage.postJobIntro: Provide clear details about your task. This helps us connect you with the perfect professionals and generates a helpful AI-powered price estimate to guide you.
PostJobPage.tipsForEffectivePost: Tips for an Effective Job Post
PostJobPage.beSpecificClearText: Instead of "fix bathroom," say "replace leaking shower faucet and re-grout tiles around the tub." The more precise, the better!
PostJobPage.mentionDimensionsMaterialsText: For tasks like painting or flooring, include room sizes or area details. Specify if you'll provide materials or if the pro should quote for them.
PostJobPage.futureFeatureUploadPhotosText: (While not in this form, imagine being able to upload photos – they greatly help pros assess the job!)
PostJobPage.whatHappens1: 1. Your job request is shared with skilled professionals in your locality who match your needs.
PostJobPage.whatHappens2: 2. Interested experts may contact you for more details or provide their quotations.
PostJobPage.whatHappens3: 3. You can then review their profiles, compare offers, and select the best professional for your project.
PostJobPage.whatHappensNote: The AI price estimate provides a general idea of costs, but final quotes will come directly from the professionals.

JobPostingForm.jobTitleDescription: A clear, concise title helps attract the right pros (max 100 characters).
JobPostingForm.jobDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the work thoroughly: tasks, materials (yours or pro's), measurements, special instructions. More details mean better quotes!
JobPostingForm.jobDescriptionHint: Be specific for accurate understanding (min 20, max 1000 characters).
JobPostingForm.locationDescription: Specify where the service is needed (e.g., "Koramangala, Bangalore" or "560095").
JobPostingForm.urgencyPlaceholder: How soon do you need it?
JobPostingForm.numberOfProfessionalsDescription: For medium or large jobs, how many people might be required?
JobPostingForm.coreJobDetailsDesc: Start by telling us the basics of what you need.
JobPostingForm.locationAndUrgencyDesc: Help us understand where and when the job needs to be done.
JobPostingForm.scopeAndTeamDesc: Define the scale of the job.
JobPostingForm.aiNote: Note: This is an AI-generated estimate for budgetary purposes. Actual bids from professionals may vary.
JobPostingForm.validationErrorDesc: Please fill in all required fields correctly before estimating. Medium/Large jobs require number of people.
JobPostingForm.jobPostedSimulatedDesc: Your job request has been successfully submitted. Professionals will be notified.

validationMessages.jobTitleMin: Job title must be at least 5 characters.
validationMessages.jobDescriptionMin: Description must be at least 20 characters.
validationMessages.numberOfPeopleRequiredForMediumLarge: Number of people is required for medium or large jobs.

JoinAsProPage.joinAsProIntro: Become a valued professional on our platform. Connect with clients actively seeking your expertise, grow your business, and manage your work efficiently. Start by creating your profile below.
JoinAsProPage.createProfileDescription: Fill in your details to build a compelling profile. Accuracy and completeness will help you attract more clients and opportunities. This is the first step towards getting verified and listed.
JoinAsProPage.widerReachText: Connect with a large pool of customers in your service area.
JoinAsProPage.localFocusText: Get matched with jobs specifically in your preferred locations.
JoinAsProPage.buildReputationText: Collect reviews and showcase your quality work to build trust.
JoinAsProPage.verifiedPlatformText: Benefit from being part of a trusted network of professionals.
JoinAsProPage.manageJobRequestsFuture: Manage job requests and your schedule with ease (future feature).
JoinAsProPage.findingJobOpportunitiesText1: Once your profile is registered and successfully verified, you'll gain access to view and bid on job postings relevant to your skills and chosen service locations.
JoinAsProPage.findingJobOpportunitiesText2: Our platform aims to provide a steady stream of potential work, helping you grow your client base.
JoinAsProPage.findingJobOpportunitiesNote: (Full job browsing and bidding functionality for providers is currently under development and will be rolled out soon.)

ProviderRegistrationForm.locationDescription: City, State where you primarily offer services.
ProviderRegistrationForm.servicesDescription: Select all services you are proficient in.
ProviderRegistrationForm.rateDescription: Provide a range or indicate custom quotes.
ProviderRegistrationForm.bioPlaceholder: Describe your skills, experience, and what makes your service stand out.
ProviderRegistrationForm.profileImageDescription: Link to your professional photo. If blank, a placeholder will be used.
ProviderRegistrationForm.resumeDescription: Upload your resume to showcase your qualifications.

validationMessages.fullNameMin: Full name must be at least 3 characters.
validationMessages.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
validationMessages.serviceTypeRequired: Please select at least one service type.
validationMessages.experiencePositive: Experience must be a positive number.
validationMessages.bioMin: Bio must be at least 20 characters.
validationMessages.profileImageInvalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL for profile image or leave blank for placeholder.
validationMessages.resumeSinglePDF: Please upload a single PDF file.
validationMessages.resumeMaxSize: Resume file size should be less than 5MB.

VerifyDocumentsPage.provideVerificationDetails: Please provide the following details for verification. This information is kept confidential and is crucial for building trust on the platform.

DocumentVerificationForm.aadhaarDescription: Enter your 12-digit Aadhaar number. It will be stored without spaces.
DocumentVerificationForm.panDescription: Enter your 10-character PAN number. It will be stored in uppercase.
DocumentVerificationForm.otherDocumentsPlaceholder: e.g., Trade license details, previous work certifications, etc. List any documents you can provide for verification.
DocumentVerificationForm.otherDocumentsDescription: List any other documents or certifications that can help verify your profile.
DocumentVerificationForm.documentUploadNote: Actual document upload functionality would be part of a full backend implementation. For now, please provide the numbers.
DocumentVerificationForm.couldNotRetrieveInitialData: Could not retrieve initial registration data. Please start over.
DocumentVerificationForm.profileWillBeReviewed: Thank you for registering. Your profile and documents will be reviewed for verification.

validationMessages.aadhaarInvalid: Enter a valid 12-digit Aadhaar number (e.g., XXXX XXXX XXXX or XXXXXXXXXXXX).
validationMessages.panInvalid: Enter a valid PAN card number (e.g., ABCDE1234F).

LoginPage.loginToAccess: Log in to access your account and manage your services.

SignUpPage.joinKariGaar: Join kariGaar today to connect with service providers or offer your skills.

ProviderListings.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your filters or check back later.

ProviderProfilePage.providerNotFoundDesc: The provider you are looking for does not exist or may have been removed.
ProviderProfilePage.viewYourList: You can view your list from the header.
ProviderProfilePage.alreadyInJobList: {{name}} is already in your Job List.
ProviderProfilePage.noReviewsYet: No reviews yet. Be the first to leave one!

ChatPage.couldNotInitiateChat: Could not initiate chat. The provider may not exist or there was an error.
ChatPage.simulatedChat: This is a simulated chat. Messages are not actually sent.
ChatPage.initialMessage: Hi there! I'm {{name}}. How can I help you today?
ChatPage.simulatedReply: Thanks for your message! I'll get back to you shortly regarding "{{text}}...". (This is a simulated reply)

BookingConfirmationPage.jobListEmptyDesc: Please add professionals to your job list before proceeding to booking.
BookingConfirmationPage.bookingConfirmedDesc: Your request with {{names}} has been submitted. You will be contacted shortly.
BookingConfirmationPage.confirmBookingDesc: Please review your selected professionals, provide service address, and choose a payment method.
BookingConfirmationPage.serviceAddressPlaceholder: Enter your full address, including area and pincode
BookingConfirmationPage.serviceAddressHint: This is where the service will be performed.
BookingConfirmationPage.cashOnDeliveryDesc: Pay directly to the professional after service.
BookingConfirmationPage.onlinePaymentDesc: Pay securely online. (This is a simulated option)

TrackServicePage.bookingNotFoundOrInvalid: Booking not found or invalid ID.
TrackServicePage.checkBookingIdContactSupport: Please check the booking ID or contact support.
TrackServicePage.liveMapPlaceholder: Live map tracking for India would appear here. (Feature under development)
TrackServicePage.contactOptionsSimulated: Contact options are simulated for this demo.

EditProfilePage.keepInfoUpToDate: Keep your information up to date.

MyBookingsPage.viewManageBookings: View and manage your past and upcoming service bookings.

SupportPage.helpIntro: We're here to help! Find answers to common questions or reach out to our support team.
SupportPage.contactUsDescription: Can't find an answer? Get in touch with our support team.
SupportPage.supportHours: Support hours: Mon-Fri, 9 AM - 6 PM IST.

FeedbackPage.helpUsImprove: Help us improve kariGaar! Let us know about your experience.

SecurityPage.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive updates about your bookings and platform news.
SecurityPage.smsNotificationsDesc: Get critical alerts via SMS (e.g., booking confirmations).
SecurityPage.lastLoginInfo: Last login: August 10, 2024, 10:00 AM from Bangalore, India (Chrome on Desktop). (This is placeholder data. Actual login activity would be displayed here.)
SecurityPage.securityConcernsContact: For any security concerns, please contact support immediately.
